author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...BARBARA WEAKENING WHILE MOVING OVER COOLER WATER OFFSHORE OF WEST-CENTRAL MEXICO...
summary: ...BARBARA WEAKENING WHILE MOVING OVER COOLER WATER OFFSHORE OF WEST-CENTRAL MEXICO... As of 15:00 UTC TUE JUN 10 2025 the center of Barbara was located near 19.9, -108.7 with movement NW at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...BARBARA WEAKENING WHILE MOVING OVER COOLER WATER OFFSHORE OF WEST-CENTRAL MEXICO... As of 15:00 UTC TUE JUN 10 2025 the center of Barbara was located near 19.9, -108.7 with movement NW at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Storm Barbara (EP2/EP022025)
